固.definition: hard; strong; solid; sure; assuredly; undoubtedly; of course; indeed; admittedly

固化.definition: to solidify; to harden; (fig.) to make permanent; to become fixed

固原市.definition: Guyuan, prefecture-level city in Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2xia4 Hui2zu2 Zi4zhi4qu1]

固執.definition: obstinate; stubborn; to fixate on; to cling to

固始.definition: Gushi county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

固始縣.definition: Gushi county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

固守.definition: to strongly defend one's position; to be entrenched; to cling to

固安.definition: Gu'an county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei

固安縣.definition: Gu'an county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei

固定.definition: to fix; to fasten; to set rigidly in place; fixed; set; regular

固定型思維.definition: fixed mindset (as opposed to growth mindset)

固有詞.definition: native words (i.e. not derived from Chinese, in Korean and Japanese etc)

固網.definition: (telecommunications) fixed network; landline (abbr. for 固定網絡|固定网络[gu4ding4 wang3luo4])

固若金湯.definition: lit. secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom); fig. well fortified; invulnerable to attack

固話.definition: fixed-line telephone; landline telephone (abbr. for 固定電話|固定电话[gu4ding4 dian4hua4])

固鎮.definition: Guzhen, a county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4bu4], Anhui

固鎮縣.definition: Guzhen, a county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4bu4], Anhui

固陽縣.definition: Guyang county in Baotou 包頭|包头[Bao1 tou2], Inner Mongolia
